name: Jordan Lee
persona: Jordan is a 21-year-old psychology major who has faced some academic challenges, reflected in a CGPA of 2.62. While Jordan is generally calm during exams and moderately motivated to achieve better grades, maintaining consistent discipline and effort is sometimes a struggle. Jordan believes in their ability to improve and is determined to persevere, seeking ways to build better study habits and increase academic confidence. With a balanced approach, Jordan hopes to gradually raise both performance and self-efficacy in the coming semesters.
